feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:59 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
